name: 呂志誠
objective: CAD套裝軟體介紹、CAD數值技巧、二維畫圖、三維畫圖、曲面模型、實體模型建立、動畫之製作、最佳化設計、整合性之CAD系統及專題。
schedule:
週次         單元主題

1.	Introduction to CAD
2.	Hardware and graphic coordinate system
3.	Computer graphics
4.	Geometric modeling concept
5.       Mid-term exam
6.	Finite element analysis I (ANSYS)
7.	Finite element analysis II (ANSYS)
8.	Finite element analysis III (ANSYS)
9.	CAD Lab (I) – introduction to ProEngineer (ProE)
10.	CAD Lab (II) - 2D drawing techniques
11.	CAD Lab (III) – 2D drawing techniques
12.	Project 1 and report      
13.	CAD Lab (IV) – 3D drawing techniques
14.	CAD Lab (V) – 3D drawing techniques
15.	CAD Lab (VI) – 3D drawing techniques
16.	Project 2 and report
17.	CAD Lab (VII) - Assembly
18.	Final exam (hands-on software operation)
scorePolicy:
出席 : 10%
期中考與期末考 :各20% 
Projects與平時Homework : 50%
materials:
教科書 (Textbook):
P.N. Rao, CAD/CAM principles and applications, 2004, McGraw Hill, (高立圖書), ISBN-007-1242317.

應用軟體 (Software) 
Pro-E 與 ANSYS
